meanings.definition: A machine with rotating blades used to break up soil in gardening.
meanings.sent1: The rototiller made gardening easier by loosening the soil.
meanings.sent2: I borrowed a rototiller from my neighbor to work on my garden.
meanings.sent3: The rototiller and I had a race to see who could dig faster!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a rototiller, churning through ideas and possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The loud roar of the rototiller echoed through the garden as it turned the soil.

meanings.definition: To use a rototiller to prepare soil for planting.
meanings.sent1: I will rototiller the backyard before we plant the new flowers.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys rototillering the garden to get it ready for spring.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally rototillered over the hidden treasure chest in the yard!
meanings.sent4: The community's efforts to rebuild were like a rototiller, turning chaos into order.
meanings.sent5: The farmer rototillered the field with precision, ensuring the soil was perfectly mixed for planting.
